name: anathan
text: A comment left by anathan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TwoRightFeet, bookofsand, hellofditties, Boyd)

name: gusplease
text: A comment left by gusplease was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by gouldgonewild, shawkee2, equinn2006, TheLoneliestMonkey, bookofsand, mighty_pit, nutmeg, Rapid_Roy, tandembandit)

name: nabeel84
text: We do see that drawing.

name: ford
text:
I've just realized that a crazy amount of lamed posts in the archive seem to be lamed only because whoever posted, did so before reading the entire archive. anathan could very well have been lamed just for reacting before he knew what happens later.

Seems like a hell of a requirement. "Before you post anything you will read the entire archive, and commit a detailed timeline to memory! Otherwise you shall be LAMED!

name: stuart
text: I follow a linguistic convention that any tags left open by the SUBMIT call are automatically closed. Does any lazy-ass scripting language do that?

name: skunkman
text: Your typo correction got more chubbies than the original post. wtf assetbar!

name: anzio
text: To be fair, I read through the entire archive twice before I even considered making an account for posting. But you know, that's just me. Probably literally just me.

name: soticoto
text: Chubby cos your picture gives me hella headaches.

name: anzio
text: It is the most fantastic.

name: soticoto
text: Aspirin is the most fantastic about now.

name: deimosrising
text: We can only assume this friend is Blister, because who else does RB know who has ordered from restaurants in Heaven before?

name: sp1derbaby
text: I'm guessing it's a reference to the urban legends surrounding Chinese takeaways which usually start with "oh yeah one time my friend..."

name: mercuri0us
text: Oh yeah one time my friend got a cockroach in his Chinese food from this dodgy-ass place, no shit.

name: bobbieluvsya
text: My mom's ex-boyfriend got an entire rat in his pineapple chicken. Just hangin' out, not even skinned.

name: moishe_weinberg
text: At least the rat wasn't getting it on, missionary style

name: arcibi
text: That is probably one of the worst fortunes you can get in a fortune cookie

name: apocowarg
text: As bad as: May the urine in your bladder burn like a thousand paper ghosts.

name: heccibiggs
text: Please tell me that is a genuine one that you got.

name: apocowarg
text: The day I pull that fortune is the day I marry a Chinese waiter. Not because he wrote the message only because he delivered such a glorious message to me.

name: glopdemon
text: Furious ding dongs are the worst kind.

name: wangflop
text: I would like to know what aspects of a ding dong drawing make it "FURIOUS".

name: ssddr
text: Obviously the lines of rage as illustrated here

name: spinynorman
text:
Also the arm motions articulate all the genital fury.

A ding dong is often furious - it is not a peaceful organ by any means

name: tekende
text: I AM THE MASTERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR

name: invidious
text: That was where Manflesh reached his apex.

name: tekende
text: Indeed. That was the greatest joke of all time.

name: centipede_damascus
text: You'd think the restauranteurs would be more polite in Heaven.

name: minortough
text: Why should there be such an angry man in the food service industry in heaven?

name: dovey
text: Because people are ruining his idea of Heaven, which is much proliferation of ding-dongs in food.

name: lastlarf
text: In excess of seven ding dongs! That's at least eight ding dongs, people. Do not eat at that place.

name: dr_manflesh_desires_anal_play_immediately
text: A comment left by dr_manflesh_desires_anal_play_immediately was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, Circadin, Mastronaut, aperson)

name: i_love_kate
text: Chubby for the screen name.

name: tekende
text: or just such as 7.01

name: behka
text: see, this is why molly is so down

name: xud
text: Exactly how furious can a drawing of a ding dong get?

name: straw
text:
Observe:

[IMGS OFF]

name: d-pad
text: Man, that is one ding dong I hope I never meet in a dark alley.

name: tetrisattack
text: Damn those furious ding dongs!

name: hendetta
text: Lord spare me from those terrible furious ding dongs.

name: dasilodavi
text: What is Onstad's thing with ding dongs in the food here?

name: killerlimpet
text: Ask Retardo.

name: molesticide
text:
i've said it before, but this is the first time i've ever meant it.

it required this one final reading before i even realized it.

this is my favorite strip.

this is the one i REMEMBER, in strange times when i'm not expecting to.

i don't know why. other strips are funnier, others make more sense, others have more emotional investment.

but this is the one i remember the most. this is the one.

ding DONG

name: charchar
text: <----Friggin' loves Jade Garden's vegetarian dishes.  I would totally marry their veg. moo shu and never even cheat on it.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Only Pat is a vegulon.
He could have made up the ding dong stories out of repressed and indignant rage.

Or not.

name: atmus
text: Not to mention, Pat is cursed to think about ding dongs, at least subconciously.

name: buttermoths
text:
I was at a Dim Sum place with a lady a couple of weeks ago. They tables were covered with large sheets of paper, 'cause Dim Sum can get kinda messy...and we ordered only vegulon stuff.
I went to the bathroom after the meal, and I swear that when I got back the waiter had drawn such a huge, furious ding-dong all over the table.

Or it could've been me or my lady friend who drew it. The Tsing Tao was flowing.

name: rowboat
text: Maybe she was trying to draw a Nintendo.

name: scion
text: Tried to chubby ya, butters, but I was already too friendly on this page. Dang the excellence of this comic!

name: pogo
text: Ding-dong?

name: tekende
text: The witch is dead.

name: bixschmix
text:
THAT JOKE IS APPROPRIATELY AGED FOR POGO'S APPROVAL**

**nah i'm just joshing you're an OK guy pogo

name: pogo
text: Thanks, dear.  And I finally watched the "George Washinton" animation you icavar is taken from, very funny and mind-distorting.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Furious ding-dong = Penis, the Latin word for sword.

name: theyang
text: I think he is trying to communicate something again

name: carlyle
text: I imagine a liberal use of cross-hatching and the legnth would be the entire paper.

name: jay_wish
text: I love when Beef gets FURIOUS. He looks so hardcore.
